item.content:encoded: Bienvenido a WordPress. Esta es tu primera entrada. Edítala o Bórrala, ¡y comienza a publicar!.

item.title: About Us
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
MARITIMA & TRANSPORTES HONDURAS S.A. de C.V., “MATRA”

Is an experienced vessel husbanding agency with more than 40 years of experience providing excellent service in the handling of most types of vessels and their requirements on arrival to and departure from Honduras ports.

Our operational and multilingual staff is highly qualified in the management of different vessels always achieving a smooth turnaround for vessel operators, vessel brokers, charters, import-export organizations in the dry and wet bulk business.

We hold memberships to several renowned shipping councils and associations including:

  • AHCORENA (Asociación Hondureña de Compañías y Representantes Navieras) Presidency 1998-2004, Treasurer 2005-2009
  • CCIC Cámara de Comercio e Industrias Cortes, San Pedro Sula
  • BIMCO The Baltic and International Maritime Council Members since 1978: # 100368

We are proud to be an associate member of INTERTANKO (International Association of Independent Tanker Owners)

BANKING: BANCO ATLANTIDA S.A. Honduras BANCO DE OCCIDENTE S.A. Honduras WHITNEY NATIONAL BANK, New Orleans, La, USA

item.title: Vessels
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Tankers
Bulk - Dry/Wet
At MATRA, we have the specialist skills needed for working with tankers carrying highly sensitive cargo. We have been handling LNG and LPG tankers for over 30 years. MATRA provides agency cover for our clients bulk carrying needs whether dry or wet.
RORO Cruise
MATRA provides agency cover for all RORO vessels. We deal with the specific demands of roro ships including the integration of RORO with other intermodal transport systems. MATRA provides agency cover for every type of cruise vessel. We offer a first class service to all cruise vessels consigned to our care in transit or turnaround ports.
Military Liners
MATRA is more than just basic agency services and is well equipped to deal with the demands of military vessels. MATRA is already contracted to provide agency services for the US NAVY. MATRA is best placed to offer our clients the high-quality skills needed within the liner trade.

MATRA offers our customers a full range of services, across all the shipping sectors: Arranging bunkers, crew changes, ship chandling, spare parts, provisions supply, full liner services, inland haulage & distribution, shore tours, warehousing and others.

MATRA and its management is at your service to tailor unique full point to point logistic services packages for your product and to deliver the very best standards of service at every location.

Our history as well as our client base speaks for itself. With over 200 vessels per year, there are few types of shipment if any, that MATRA does not handle.

item.title: Our Expertise
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
• Vessel Husbanding • Agency Representation
• Stevedoring • Brokerage
• Vessel Operations • Special Transports
• Project Cargo: handling of heavy  lift/ outsized equipment • Forwarders/Expeditors
• Equipment leasing • Other sea and land related activities

MARITIMA & TRANSPORTES HONDURAS S.A. de C.V., “MATRA” is a knowledgeable vessel Port & husbanding Agency committed to provide the best maritime services at the 5 mayor Honduran ports. MATRA's team brings together the many facets that are required to provide the most discerning client with specific shipping related services amid best-in-industry standards and stringent codes of conduct. Our computer supported technology and communications guarantee unfailing tasks execution.

By working in partnership Matra goes beyond the traditional ship agent competences. We are able to tailor our services to meet our client’s needs, from basic vessel husbanding, to the completion of import/export ventures with the convenience of a single point of contact and a singleaccounting package.

1979:
Matra did the H/L of 78 tons rotary ovens for a cement plant [LF Schmid/CPH to Cementos de Honduras] for the 27 km from Puerto Cortes
From 1985 to 2003
Matra has participated in several major Hospital supply projects ranging from the H/L and transport of 38 containers to 126 containers for the Japanese assistance group JICA through Nissho-Iwai Corp.
1984:
Matra performed as a sole logistics contractor for "Consorcio El Cajon"

1986:
Matra managed the H/L and transportation of 3 75-ton generators and transformers from Puerto Cortes to El Cajon for Siemens.
1987:
H/L and transport of a 36-ton cutterhead dredge from Puerto Cortes to the Karataska Lagoon in the Mosquitia region on our RORO "PAINKIRA" for USAID.
1989:
Assisted in completion of prefabricated sewage plant for the US-Air Force base at Palmerola, Comayagua, Honduras
1994:
Matra managed the building of a pier and warehouse system of 7 TEU's on top of a platform built 10' above MLW in the coastal jungle near the mouth of Rio Patuca, and thus introducing with our vessels containerized service to that part of the Mosquitia-region of Honduras for USAID
1996
Matra managed the building of a pier and warehouse system of 7 TEU's on top of a platform built 10' above MLW in the coastal jungle near the mouth of Kaukira, Karataska Lagoon for USAID.
2000:
Matra managed the replacement Tegucigalpa’s destroyed water system due to Hurricane Mitch with 3,475 tons major pipe from 50cm to 90 cm for Morbihannaise et Nantaise de Navegation a Vapeur.
2000:
Matra delivered 113 loaded 40' containers to equal amount of villages throughout Honduras areas destroyed by Hurricane Mitch with food and lowering to ground with our manual coffee-grinders/german legs.
Siemens-Corning-Nordeutsche Seekabel Werke: Center of North-Central American Logistics between Pto Cabezas, Nicaragua and Isla Mujeres, Mex. was established with Matra in Pto Cortes during the cable lying works of ARCOS-1. Matra also provided 2 vessels for their use during 6 months.
2002:
For JAN DE NUL Matra managed logistics and H/L work during the dredging of Canal de Chamelecon. We also hired all their labor requirements with a monthly average of 50 persons.
H/L work and tug-barge chartering activities for Van der Vlist Projects for 16 x 315 tons MAN engines and accessories for EMCE/ENERSA, Choloma via Puerto Cortes and 12X 285-ton engines and accessories for LUFFUSSA via San Lorenzo.
CENOSA/Polysius expansion project - discharge and delivery coordination.

We are proud to include some of the major internationally renowned shipping companies in the fields of oil and its by-products, dry and wet bulk, and passengers in our customer list. For them we have been involved in different projects among which we can mention:

We cover our clients’ needs in every port in Honduras:

Main Office: San Pedro Sula

Port Agencies:

• Puerto Cortés • San Lorenzo
• Roatán • Omoa
• Tela • San Lorenzo
• Ceiba • Puerto Castilla
• Puerto Lempira • Cauquira
• Barra Patuca

Liaison Office: Tegucigalpa

In addition, Matra’s management & operational personal are equipped with: Telephones / Fax / Cellular Phones / E-mail VHF Stationary and Mobile Units

Port Information and restrictions are available upon request

item.title: Equipment
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
MATRA has top of the line grabs and accessories for dry bulk cargo.

For ship board use Spare parts in shore chest
  • 4 pcs cargo GRAB Buckets  ( S#7248 =#1, 7249=#2, 7250=#3, 7241=#4)
  • Hook-on/Single-Rope Hydraulic operated (Manuf: Tobu Jukogyo Co., Ltd., Japan)
  • Manual single line controlled opening (1994)
    • Vol. Cap.:  10m3 each
    • Weight:     9.000 kilos each
  • Designed for gravity 0.95 – 1.40 mt/m3, maximum lump size: 50 mm
  • Capacity :  about. 10 -13 Tons
  • 2 x Wire Rope: 28 mm x 2 x 1115mm
    		•
  • 4 - ¾” Ropes for manual operations 21m / 70’
  • 4 pairs of leather gloves
  • Grab Instructions book
  • 1 English
  • 1 Spanish
    		•

item.title: Contact Us
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
To find out more about the complete range of services offered by MATRA, or if you wish us to tender for any contracts, please contact us anytime! Marítima y Transportes, S.A. de C.V. MATRA 1-2 Avenida, 2a Calle, N.E. No. 16A, Edificio La Plaza San Pedro Sula, Cortés, 991 Telephone     : (504) 553-4900 / 553-1773 / 552-1942 / 552-1944 Mobile            : (504) 9991-3356 Cable              : MATRA or MARHOND Fax                  : (504) 553-3730 Email              : hpeters@matra.hn matraptc@matra.hn matrasps@matra.hn matra@matra.hn We look forward to being of service to your company; we take pride in the long term relationships we build with our clients. LIAISON OFFICE: TEGUCIGALPA PINEDA Y ASOCIADOS S. de R.L. Office Location: 2nd Level – Centro Comercial Villa Real, in front of Hotel Honduras Maya, Colonia Palmira, Tegucigalpa, D.C. P.O.BOX            : 991, San Pedro Sula, Honduras Telephone         : (504) 235-8937 FAX                    : (504) 232-2709
PORT OFFICE: PUERTO CORTES Office Location: 6 Calle, 1 y 2 Avenida, Barrio El Centro P.O.BOX          : 991, San Pedro Sula, Honduras. Telephone       : (504) 665-0390 / 665-1245 / 665-1025 Cable                : MARHOND or INTERMODAL Fax                    : (504) 665-0396 E-MAIL             : matraptc@matra.hn, matraopscenter@matra.hn,             matracontabptc@matra.hn VHF Frequency: Marine Channel 74 (STBY)

item.title: Quienes Somos
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: MARITIMA Y TRANSPORTES HONDURAS, SA de CV, "MATRA" Nuestro personal operativo y multilingüe está altamente cualificado en la gestión de los diferentes barcos siempre lograr un cambio sin problemas para los operadores de buques, agentes marítimos, cartas, importación-exportación de las organizaciones en el negocio de granel seco y húmedo. Tenemos miembros de varios consejos de envío de renombre y asociaciones entre ellos: * AHCORENA (Asociación Hondureña de Compañías y Representantes Navieras) 1998-2004 de la Presidencia, Tesorero 2005-2009 * CCTI Cámara de Comercio e Industrias de Cortés, San Pedro Sula, * BIMCO Internacional y del Báltico Marítima miembros del Consejo desde 1978: # 100368 Estamos orgullosos de ser miembro asociado de Intertanko (Asociación Internacional de Propietarios Independientes de Petroleros) BANCOS: BANCO INDUSTRIAL SA, San Pedro Sula, Honduras Banco de Occidente, SA, San Pedro Sula, Whitney National Bank, Nueva Orleans, LA, EE.UU.

item.title: Services
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
As a vessel husbanding agency committed to provide the best maritime service at the ports in Honduras, MATRA's staff brings together the many features required to provide the most discerning client with specific shipping related services amid best-in-industry standards, stringent codes of conduct, and IT supported technology and communication.

Whether the requirements are for standard shipping, or import/export projects including complex off-shore , heavy lifting, or marine support, MATRA serves as a one-stop-shop.

MARITIMA & TRANSPORTES HONDURAS S.A. de C.V., “MATRA” is uniquely qualified to represent you in a multitude of shipping needs, be it a basic husbanding requirement or the service of the entire shipment chain. Our capabilities go beyond the standard port agency and husbanding to the highly complex projects and heavy list.

Chartering brokers
Cruise Agents: Roatán, Utila, Guanaja, Omoa & Puerto Cortes
Customs clearance: Puerto Cortes
Freight forwarders: Puerto Cortes
Port Agents Puerto Cortes, La Ceiba, San Lorenzo, Roatán, Pto. Castilla, Tela
Project Cargo: Handling of heavy lift / outsized equipment
Sea & River transport: Coastal & Honduras Bay Islands & La Mosquitia
Ship brokers Atlantic and Pacific Americas
Stevedores: Puerto Cortes & San Lorenzo
Tanker Agents: Pto. Cortes, Tela, Omoa, Pto. Castilla, San Lorenzo
Trailer & Cont. Transp. Honduras
Warehousing Honduras
Marine services Honduras Ports, Rivers and Bays.

MATRA is highly proficient in providing a wide range of marine services. As our extensive list of long-term clients demonstrates, we have been successfully engaged in off-shore services, transit, bunkering, ship chandler, CTM, fresh water, provisions and technical supplies, CHT removal, repairs and other forms of vessel support.

item.title: MATRA
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: ARCHIV - Das von Piraten entführte Hamburger Containerschiff "Hansa Stavanger" (undatiertes Archivfoto). Die Lage der seit drei Monaten von somalischen Piraten festgehalten Besatzung des deutschen Frachters «Hansa Stavanger» wird immer dramatischer. «Wir haben kein Wasser, kein Essen, keine Medikamente», berichtete der deutsche Kapitän nach Angaben des Nachrichtenmagazins «Der Spiegel». «Wir können nicht mehr», schrieb er in einer Email. Seit Wochen versuchen deutsche Behörden in Zusammenarbeit mit der Hamburger Reederei Leonhardt & Blumberg, eine Lösung für die 24 Seeleute zu finden. Unter ihnen sind fünf Deutsche Foto: Dietmar Hasenpusch dpa (Zu dpa 4202) +++(c) dpa - Bildfunk+++
